text: A wid iumnen! Ccada garawen, ma tusa d tmeppant ar yiwen segwen. Di lawan uweuui, sin irgazen ieesbiyen, segwen, ne$ wiyav war segwen, ma tellam d iminigen di tmurt, u tusa kwen id twa$it n tmeppant. A ten qesden deffir teallit. Ma tcukkem, sgallet pen s Oebbi: "ur d nesfayday syis, xas iaana llzem nne$, ur nteffer ccada n Oebbi, mulac, nekwni a nili seg imednab
